p.d: Ange is still in shock after learning that Anna is back with her 18-year-old son. However, he has no time to dwell on it as the Polish priest in a mountain village has been beaten to death in his confessional. Directed by: Didier Le Pecheur (season 2, France, 2015) Screenplay: Nathalie Hugon, Gilles Cahoreau, Marc-Antoine Laurent Cast: Gérard Darmon (Ange Renucci), Yann Gael (Sébastien Le Tallec), Didier Ferrari (Toussaint Marchioni), Jeanne Bournaud (Lise Darcourt), Chloé Stefani (Joséphine Vissac), Nathanaël MaIni (Paul Versini), Caroline Proust (Anna), Alexandre de Seze (Bruno) Genre: detective Parental guidance: TV-PG
